text: Beverly Grant (born 25 September 1970) is a former Jamaican sprinter. == External links == * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Jamaican female sprinters Category:World Athletics Championships medalists Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1999 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Jamaica Category:World Athletics Indoor Championships winners
title: Beverly Grant
